item.title: GameStop Has Patched the ‘Infinite Money’ Trade Glitch
item.content:encoded:
GameStop has issued a statement revealing that the ‘Infinite Money Glitch’ used when trading in items has been patched.

GameStop is one of the few offline video game stores that continues to operate effectively, consistently providing new deals and offers to its customers. Just two months ago, they launched a unique promotion called “Trade Anything Day.” Now, they have introduced a new offer on pre-owned games. However, some customers took unfair advantage of this promotion, prompting GameStop to put an immediate stop to it.

Customers Were Buying and Trading in the Switch 2 at GameStop for Extra Credit

This is how the infinite money glitch worked at GameStop stores. The company was offering a 25% bonus on the trade-in value of any pre-owned item. Customers would buy a Nintendo Switch 2 for $414.99, along with a pre-owned game that costs no more than $0.99. When they traded in both of these items, a promotional bonus was triggered, increasing the trade credit to $472.50. This effectively gave the customer $57.51 in store credit.

The YouTuber who exposed this glitch revealed that they were able to make $600 across both their trade cards and also get the Switch 2 they traded for at an even lower price, since it was tagged as pre-owned once it was traded in.

GameStop has now issued a statement revealing that customers could repeat this process as many times as they wanted, creating an infinite money glitch. However, the glitch has been patched, and customers will not be able to “convert basic arithmetic into an endless revenue stream.” At the same time, the company will not stop promotions, and even though they “applaud the creativity,” they don’t want their stores to be used as “infinite money printers”.

Check out GameStop’s complete statement below:

GameStop is aware of the “GameStop Infinite Money Glitch,” exposed by YouTuber RJCmedia.

By purchasing a Nintendo Switch 2 for $414.99 and then immediately trading it back in along with the purchase of a pre-owned game, a promotional bonus was triggered that increased the Switch 2 trade credit to $472.50.

In short, our system briefly valued the pre-owned trade more than the new retail cost of the console itself, creating a narrow window where customers could repeat this transaction over and over again to amass infinite trade credit.

Effective immediately, the glitch has been patched. Trade promotions have been updated to ensure customers can no longer convert basic arithmetic into an endless revenue stream, and balance has been restored.

GameStop remains committed to offering promotions that reward our customers, and while we applaud the creativity, we gently remind everyone that our stores are not designed to function as infinite money printers.

item.title: The Midnight Walkers Release Date Countdown: Exact Start Times & Release Date
item.content:encoded:
The Midnight Walkers is stumbling into view with an early access release on the horizon, giving players a new PvPvE zombie extraction shooter to sink their teeth into.

With over 300,000 wishlists on Steam, anticipation is high for The Midnight Walkers, and the countdown for the release date is well and truly on.

If you’re chomping at the bit and are eagerly awaiting the release date of The Midnight Walkers, Insider Gaming can help you count down to the exact minute of release.

What is The Midnight Walkers Release Date?

The official release date for The Midnight Walkers is January 29, but players in some regions will be able to play a day earlier.

Developer Oneway Ticket Studio is based in Korea, so release times are adapted to their time zone, which means the official release date isn’t actually solid. Instead, it flows with the regions of the world, but the doors will open to players simultaneously.

The Midnight Walkers does not have a staggered release, so there won’t be any situations where players in one region can access the game while others are locked out, and the length of the wait is the same for all players.

However, theoretically at least, some players will be able to play ahead of the official release date.

The Midnight Walkers Countdown: Exact Start Time

The Midnight Walkers official release time is 6 PM PT on January 28, with the exact time of entry varying for players across the world.

Release times come from SteamDB, which shows that players in the United States will be able to start playing the game earlier than the official January 28 release date.

The table below shows the exact start time for The Midnight Walkers in major time zones across the world, so you can jump in as soon as the doors open. If there are any changes to the release times, this guide will be updated.

item.title: Witcher 3 Online Mod Lets You Play the Entire Campaign With Friends
item.content:encoded:
A new multiplayer mod for The Witcher 3, called ‘Witcher Online’, lets players complete the entire campaign with their friends.

There appears to be a lot happening with the Witcher franchise. Reports suggest that a new DLC is set to arrive by May 2026, and the next installment is also in development. However, it seems we have a long wait ahead before these releases become available. In the meantime, players can explore a mod that significantly enhances the original game’s replayability.

The Witcher Online Mod Features Customization, Emotes, and Full Campaign Experience

Spotted by PCGamesN, a new mod for The Witcher 3 has surfaced on NexusMods called Witcher Online. The mod adds multiplayer to the title, allowing players to play through the entire story with their friends. The mod features chat functionality for conversations with strangers, along with emotes to express yourself even more.

The Witcher Online Mode can be combined with the Custom Player Characters mod to add more customisation, and the Chill Out mod just to have a relaxing time in the taverns with your friends. Check out the The Witcher 3 multiplayer mod in action in the video below:

Players will need a non-pirated next-gen version of The Witcher 3, version 4.04 or higher. It can be purchased through Steam or GOG.

The Witcher 3 is known for having some of the best choice-driven narrative campaigns, a wealth of high-quality side quests, and some of the most intriguing characters. It is a wonderful experience on your own, which will only be enhanced once your friends join in on the fun.

In other news, The Witcher 3’s rumoured expansion could take players to a new region. Additionally, Netflix’s live-action series will end in 2026. What are your thoughts on the Witcher Online mod? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Cairn Release Date & Exact Start Time
item.content:encoded:
Cairn is set to be one of the biggest indie releases of 2026, with the title surging past 700,000 wishlists last year, and the wait for the release date is rapidly approaching a conclusion.

The climbing title has garnered plenty of interest already and is expected to surge in popularity to hit a fresh summit when it launches on PC and PlayStation 5.

If you’re counting down the hours until you can jump in, Insider Gaming has all the release date and start time details for Cairn.

When Does Cairn Release?

Cairn has an official release date of January 29, but the exact date will vary depending on your platform and your location in the world.

Some players will be able to play on the evening of January 28, while others will have to wait until the early hours of the morning on January 30, as developer The Game Bakers has opted for a simultaneous worldwide release. However, the release times are different on each platform.

What Time Does Cairn Release?

Cairn will be available worldwide at 9 AM PT on January 29 on Steam, but players on PlayStation 5 look set to be able to jump in hours earlier.

The start time details come from SteamDB, showing that the exact time of day for the release with vary depending on where they are located in the world. As such, while the release date is officially January 29, players in some regions won’t be able to jump in until the early hours of the morning of January 30.

It’s a different story on PlayStation 5, however, as the PlayStation Store states a release time of 9 PM PT on January 28 on the platform, 12 hours ahead of the Steam release. Should these times change, this article will be updated.

item.title: Arknights: Endfield Preload Guide & File Sizes Explained
item.content:encoded:
The action is waiting for you in Arknights: Endfield. But you can’t prepare for it unless you preload Arknights: Endfield, and to do that, you also need to know its file sizes across PlayStation, PC, and more.

The End(field) wait is nigh. A new Arknights will burst onto the scene shortly, and it is a huge push in a different direction for the franchise. No longer is tower defense at the forefront of the core gameplay system, as Endfield has evolved and exploded into life with action and RPG flourishes. If you’re one of the many eager to dive, find out how to preload now.

How To Download & Preload Arknights: Endfield

You can preload Arknights: Endfield across mobile, PlayStation, and PC, and it requires you to buy and download the game from the respective game storefronts.

Here’s a quick rundown on how to download Endfield across its various platforms.

How To Preload Arknights: Endfield On Mobile (Android & Apple)

  1. Go to the Google Play page on Android or the App Store page on Apple.
  2. Search for Arknights: Endfield.
  3. Confirm your purchase.
  4. Launch the Arknights: Endfield application once it’s installed.
  5. Create or log in to your Gryphline account.
  6. Now, you can predownload Arknights: Endfield!

How To Preload Arknights: Endfield On PC (Windows & Epic Games Store)

  1. Visit the official Arknights: Endfield website.
  2. Click on either Windows or the Epic Games Store in the bottom-right corner.
  3. Download the Arknights: Endfield launcher.
  4. Once it’s installed, you can preload the game.
  5. When it’s ready, you can play Endfield the second it goes live—find out Arknights: Endfield’s release date and start times.

How To Preload Arknights: Endfield On PS5

  1. Make your way to the PS5 store.
  2. Use the search function to find Arknights: Endfield.
  3. Click on the game.
  4. Buy and download Arknights: Endfield.
  5. Preload the game once it’s ready.

Arknights: Endfield File Sizes on PlayStation, Xbox & PC, Explained

The file sizes for Arknights: Endfield range from anywhere between 22 GB to 78 GB, depending on which platform you want to play on.

Below, we’ve listed all four major platforms Arknights: Endfield is available on, and this will be updated if additional ports arrive on Xbox or Nintendo Switch after launch.

These seem like reasonable enough download sizes. Aside from the ever-unpredictable PC unpacking size, it’s all between 20-40 GB for what looks like a fairly meaty game. Message the Insider Gaming Discord Server with your thoughts on the game and if you’ve been able to play it already.

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Still Coming to Xbox in 2026, Insider Reaffirms
item.content:encoded:
A reliable insider has reaffirmed that Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth will release for Xbox in 2026.

For those unaware, back in September 2025, it was claimed that Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth would release for Xbox and the Switch 2 in 2026. We have yet to receive any official confirmation from either Xbox or Square Enix, but the insider seems confident it will release this year.

Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth for Xbox is Coming this Year

The insider who has reaffirmed the release for Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth on Xbox is none other than NateTheHate. Interestingly, the reconfirmation comes via the insider’s latest X post (formerly Twitter), where he thanked the community for dubbing him r/GamingLeaksAndRumour’s Leaker of the Year.

In one of the comments, NateTheHate was asked whether the plans for Rebirth coming to Xbox in 2026 are still the same, to which he responded, “Yes.” NateTheHate also stated that leaking something about Half-Life 3 is something he will “try to achieve” this year. And, there’s a chance that we might get some new leaks on his next podcast.

Final Fantasy 7 Remake has already released for both Xbox consoles and the Switch 2 on January 22, 2026, and hopefully, the port for FF7 Rebirth should be next on the list. At the moment, all we can do is wait for an official confirmation, but we do know the entire trilogy is making its way to Switch 2; it is just a matter of when now.

In other news, the director of Final Fantasy 7 Remake has stated that the FF6 Remake series should be led by someone else. Additionally, the game experience for the third instalment in the FF7 Remake series is “more or less complete“.
